newsitem.title: USA: FSA qualifies seven issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA qualifies seven issues for bond insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said it has qualified for bond insurance the following seven municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Chandler, Ariz., $9.7 million general obligation refunding bonds and $5.275 million highway bonds.
--Hoosic Valley CSD, N.Y., $6.502 million school district bonds.
--Nassau County, N.Y., $185.365 million general improvement bonds and $4.715 million sewer district bonds.
